Package edu.uidaho.junicon.support.transforms

Provides supporting methods used by XSLT transforms.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICatalog
    ICatalog provides a catalog of namespaces, where a namespace is set of name-value pairs.
    IThreadResolver
    Resolver for finding the current threads unique resource instance.
    IThreadResource
    The current threads unique resource instance.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Catalog
    Catalog provides an named set of property maps.
    TransformSupport
    Supporting methods used by XSLT transforms.

Package edu.uidaho.junicon.support.transforms Description

Provides supporting methods used by XSLT transforms. The static methods used by XSLT delegate to the current thread's unique instance. Delegation uses an inheritable thread local, or a resolver if specified.

This package is standalone and has no dependencies on other packages. The standalone grammar, XSLT transforms, these Java cut-throughs, and the Groovy prelude script, together can be used to effect transforming Unicon into Groovy independently from the transformational interpreter.
